Key Match Events: Detroit Tigers pitcher Tarik Skubal was hit by a comebacker in the sixth inning but continued to pitch and finished the frame.
Jason Foley allowed two runs in the top of the ninth inning, leading to the Colorado Rockies' victory.
Post-Match Reflections: Tarik Skubal mentioned that his hand was a little sore but he was not too worried about it.
Skubal and the team decided it was smart not to come out for the seventh inning due to discomfort in catching the ball.
